name: tianji
description: Tianji is a self-hosted website analytics and monitoring platform focused on privacy. It tracks visits, referrers, uptime, and performance, presenting insights in a modern, lightweight dashboard.
features: Website analytics: Track page views, visitors, and referrers without cookies or invasive tracking methods.
Uptime monitoring: Monitor website and service availability with configurable check intervals and alerting.
Performance tracking: Measure page load times and performance metrics to identify optimization opportunities.
Privacy-focused: Collect analytics data without personal information or tracking individual users across sessions.
Real-time dashboard: View current visitor activity and system status in a live-updating dashboard.
Custom events: Track custom events and conversions to measure specific user actions and goals.
Multiple sites: Monitor multiple websites and services from a single installation with separate dashboards.
Lightweight script: Use a minimal tracking script that doesn't impact page load performance.
Alerts: Receive notifications when monitored services go down or performance degrades.
Historical data: Access historical analytics and uptime data to identify trends and patterns over time.
Geographic insights: View visitor locations and traffic sources without compromising individual privacy.
API access: Integrate analytics data into other tools using the REST API for custom reporting.
